channel.title: ThisIsReality BETA | All skills | 25 bosses | Unique content |Striving For Perfe
channel.description:
This Is Reality is back after 3 years with a new 317 ground base for it's RSPS. Previosuly website: www.this-is-reality.forumotion.com
Discover the old Runescape with a whole lot of new item sets, mini-games and more content. We've built the server to last, with a wiki page, automatic voting system, automatic donating system, beautiful forum and website too it. So that it will be easier to keep yourself updated and active to all times.
The server loads 474 maps, 634 npcs, animations and graphics. It loads 474 items, but has a few higher revisioned items, such as: nex armour, ganodermic armour, dragon claws, and so on. This means that all of the items are from the 2008 era, bringing you that old school feeling when you play our server.
Our features are superb if you are a RSPS player and love to use a little time on the servers.
[ul][*][B]20+ Bosses found in-game[/B] [*][B]Double XP every single Weekend[/B] [*]Lootshare and clan chats [*]All skills working [*]Duel arena and staking [*][B]Fully PK point system[/B] [*]Clue scrolls including Easy, Medium and Hard [*]Many dungeoneering bosses [*]Dicebag [*][B]Custom items, like lime whip and dragon kiteshield[/B] [*]Automatic donation system [*]Automatic voting reward system [*]Many shops made for in-game balance [*]Basic mini-games [I]such as[/I] the barrows mini-game with rewards [*]If you die outside the wilderness you won't lose any items [*][B]No lag and up 24/7 on a dedicated VPS with premium hosting[/B] [*]Our website has a uptime on 99.99% with a premium hosting[/ul]
You can visit us at www.RealityRSPS.com and be with us, to create, to build, to grief and enjoy the community with friends and foes. Our focus is to bring our RSPS to a new reality and create unique content for our players. Thanks to our two professional server programmers, our webmaster and bugtesters.
We are still in betamodus which means that the webclient is still being fixed to suit the optional for our server. This means that the server needs to be downloadet at www.realityrsps.com/play.html . Everything else can be read about in our forum section: www.realityrsps.com/forum . Please take some time to look around, because you won't regret it! :gg:
IMAGES:
[img]http://realityrsps.com/images/gallery/general/pic2.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/305d52f8f453be9b39099831c42a5090.png[/img] [img]http://realityrsps.com/images/gallery/general/pic.png[/img] [img]http://realityrsps.com/images/gallery/monsters/02.png[/img] [img]http://realityrsps.com/images/gallery/general/pic4.png[/img]

item.dc:creator: @Godishorny Godishorny
item.description:
@Godishorny wrote:

Vain_:

what server is this based off of?

Originally it’s project insanity; but i don’t remember what the server name was before i decided to use it. Was very unknown with very little content.

OT: Just added a new client. Now it updates the client and cache automatically! Have fun!

This Is Reality is back after 3 years with a new 317 ground base for it’s RSPS. Previosuly website: www.this-is-reality.forumotion.com

Discover the old Runescape with a whole lot of new item sets, mini-games and more content.
